summaries.title: Need More Space on Your iPhone? Adjust These Settings Now
summaries.summary: The article discusses how iPhone users can free up storage space by adjusting certain settings. It highlights the importance of managing storage as users capture more memories through photos and videos. The piece offers practical tips to optimize space on the device, ensuring users can continue to enjoy their iPhone without running out of storage.

summaries.title: Revanth Reddy plans to make Greater Hyderabad pollution-free
summaries.summary: Telangana Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy has instructed officials to create an action plan aimed at making Greater Hyderabad a pollution-free city. During a review meeting with senior officials and newly appointed Zonal Commissioners, he stressed the importance of implementing effective measures for cleanliness and waste management.

summaries.title: OPINION: Leadership imperatives for 2026
summaries.summary: The article discusses the leadership challenges faced in 2025, highlighting a significant leadership deficit across organizations, with trust in managers plummeting and high levels of stress and burnout among leaders. It emphasizes the need for leaders to adopt four key imperatives for 2026: resetting their mindset to see opportunities, realigning with organizational purpose, reconnecting with employees, and re-energizing team commitment. The author argues that addressing these issues is crucial to prevent further organizational failures and improve overall morale and productivity.

summaries.title: EDITORIAL: upcoming spectrum auction
summaries.summary: The upcoming spectrum auction in Pakistan is crucial for enhancing internet speed and reliability, as the country faces significant spectrum shortages amid rising data usage. Historically, the government has prioritized spectrum sales for immediate fiscal revenue over long-term network improvements, leading to a lack of successful auctions in recent years. The government plans to auction 600 MHz of spectrum, but success will depend on pricing and payment conditions. The focus should be on improving existing 3G/4G networks while also preparing for future 5G infrastructure, ensuring that operators invest in technology upgrades to benefit consumers.

summaries.title: Stocks To Watch: IndiGo, Indian Hotels, Titan, Hyundai, Ola Electric, RITES, And Others
summaries.summary: On Wednesday, stocks of companies including IndiGo, Indian Hotels, Titan, Hyundai, Ola Electric, and RITES are expected to attract attention in the market. Investors will be closely monitoring these firms for potential trading opportunities.

summaries.title: Creative Biogene Launches High-Quality pegRNA Synthesis Service to Advance Precision Gene Editing
summaries.summary: Creative Biogene has launched a new pegRNA Synthesis Service to meet the increasing demands of the biotechnology sector for precision gene editing. This service aims to support advanced prime gene editing applications, reflecting the company's commitment to innovation in the field.

summaries.title: Defense panels still not clear on Golden Dome’s attributes - Tue, 30 Dec 2025 PST
summaries.summary: Seven months after President Trump proposed a Golden Dome missile shield, Pentagon oversight lawmakers report a lack of clarity regarding the system's attributes, cost, and schedule. The ongoing uncertainty raises concerns about the project's development and implementation.

summaries.title: One of our greatest men's one-day batters is stunned to receive a New Year Honour
summaries.summary: A renowned men's one-day cricket batter has expressed surprise and gratitude after being awarded a New Year Honour. The accolade recognizes his significant contributions to the sport, highlighting his achievements and impact in cricket.

summaries.title: Apollo Techno Industries shares to debut today. GMP steady ahead of listing
summaries.summary: Apollo Techno Industries is set to debut on the BSE SME platform today, following a successful Rs 48 crore IPO that garnered strong interest from various investor categories. The shares are expected to list with a modest grey market premium, reflecting steady demand for the company's trenchless technology in infrastructure.

summaries.title: New Residential Tower Nearly as Tall as Transamerica Pyramid Gets Approved
summaries.summary: A new residential tower in San Francisco, nearly as tall as the iconic Transamerica Pyramid, has received approval after years of delays. This development is set to significantly alter the city's skyline.

summaries.title: Automotive Thermal Management Market Research: at a CAGR of 6.8% during the forecast period
summaries.summary: QY Research Inc. has released a report on the Automotive Thermal Management market, projecting a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 6.8% from 2026 to 2032. The report includes an analysis of historical data from 2020 to 2024, along with forecasts for market share, sales, and demand.

summaries.title: Asian shares trade mixed with some exchanges closed ahead of the New Year
summaries.summary: Major Asian stock markets, including Tokyo and Seoul, were closed for year-end and New Year’s holidays, leading to mixed trading in the remaining open exchanges. In early trading, Hong Kong's Hang Seng index fell 0.5% to 25,715.16, while China's Shanghai Composite saw a slight increase of less than 0.1% to 3,966.39.

summaries.title: This Car Brand Scores The Worst For Owner Satisfaction In Consumer Reports' Ranking
summaries.summary: Consumer Reports has identified a specific car brand that ranks lowest in owner satisfaction among all brands evaluated. The report highlights the brand's shortcomings, indicating that it fails to meet customer expectations effectively.

summaries.title: Explained: Why China Banned Starlink And Penalised A Ship For Using It
summaries.summary: China has banned Starlink, citing it as a "national security threat" due to concerns over foreign-controlled satellite communications, overseas data routing, and potential military applications. Additionally, the country penalized a ship for using the service, reinforcing its stance on controlling satellite internet access within its borders.

summaries.title: Bid To Shape Budget 2026 Strategy: PM bats for mission mode reforms to sustain long-term growth
summaries.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasized the need for mission mode reforms to ensure sustained long-term growth during a discussion with prominent economists at NITI Aayog. This interaction is part of efforts to shape the strategy for the 2026 budget, focusing on innovative approaches to economic development.

summaries.title: Interview: Punjab’s law & order better than most states, says DGP Gaurav Yadav
summaries.summary: Punjab Police Chief Gaurav Yadav stated that the law and order situation in Punjab is better than in many other states. In an interview, he discussed the security challenges the state faces, current crime trends, and the ongoing efforts to combat drug-related issues, highlighting the police's effective control over law and order.

summaries.title: 2025 Editor’s Year-End Message | Reading the Structure of Change
summaries.summary: In the year-end message for 2025, the author reflects on the rapid and multifaceted changes in the technology industry, especially in artificial intelligence. The year is characterized as a complex period of transition rather than a straightforward twelve-month cycle, highlighting the significant shifts and developments that have occurred.

summaries.title: 2026: Stakeholders chart path for business survival
summaries.summary: Stakeholders emphasize that businesses must swiftly adapt to evolving economic conditions to ensure survival in 2026. They advocate for fundamental operational changes as essential for navigating future challenges.

summaries.title: Asian shares trade mixed with some exchanges closed ahead of the New Year
summaries.summary: Asian stock markets showed mixed results as major exchanges like Tokyo and Seoul were closed for the New Year holidays. In early trading, Hong Kong's Hang Seng index fell 0.5% to 25,715.16, while China's Shanghai Composite saw a slight increase of less than 0.1%, reaching 3,966.39.

summaries.title: Asian shares trade mixed with some exchanges closed ahead of the New Year
summaries.summary: Major Asian stock markets, including Tokyo and Seoul, were closed for year-end and New Year’s holidays, leading to mixed trading in the exchanges that remained open. The overall sentiment reflected a cautious approach as investors awaited further developments in the new year.
